languages.text: "Исправлять ошибки. Спасать то, что осталось от моего протектората — искать миры, затерянные в варп-шторме, изгонять ксеносов, вычищать лазутчиков Последнего восхода. И вести с династией Чорда... мирные переговоры". {n}Последние два слова Каллигос выплевывает с такой злостью, что на мгновение становится похож на прежнего себя.{/n}

"Correct my mistakes. Save what is left of my protectorate: find the worlds lost to the warp storm; drive the xenos out; weed out the Final Dawn infiltrators. And... negotiate peace with House Chorda." {n}The spite with which Calligos spits out the word "peace" makes him look like his old self for just a brief moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Исправлять ошибки. Спасать то, что осталось от моего протектората — искать миры, затерянные в варп-шторме, изгонять ксеносов, вычищать лазутчиков Последнего восхода. И вести с династией Чорда... мирные переговоры". {n}Последние два слова Каллигос выплевывает с такой злостью, что на мгновение становится похож на прежнего себя.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Correct mistakes. Save what is left of my protectorate. Find the worlds that were lost in the warp storm; drive xenos out; clean up Final Dawn infiltrators. And... negotiate peace with House Chorda." {n}The spite with which Calligos spits out the word "peace" makes him look like his old self for a brief moment.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: «Enmendar mis errores. Salvar lo que queda de mi protectorado: buscar los mundos que se perdieron en la tormenta de disformidad, expulsar a los xenos, erradicar a los agentes infiltrados del Amanecer Final. Y... negociar la paz con la casa Chorda». {n}El rencor con que Calligos espeta la palabra «paz» le devuelve su tradicional expresión durante un breve instante.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Correct my mistakes. Save what is left of my protectorate: find the worlds lost to the warp storm; drive the xenos out; weed out the Final Dawn infiltrators. And... negotiate peace with House Chorda." {n}The spite with which Calligos spits out the word "peace" makes him look like his old self for just a brief moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: «Enmendar errores. Salvar lo que queda de mi protectorado. Buscar los mundos que se perdieron en la tormenta de disformidad; expulsar a los xenos; erradicar a los agentes infiltrados del Amanecer Final. Y... negociar la paz con la casa Chorda». {n}El rencor con que Calligos espeta la palabra «paz» le devuelve su tradicional expresión durante un breve instante.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: “弥补我犯下的错误，拯救我剩下的属地。我得找回被亚空间风暴隔绝的世界，把那里的异形赶走，消灭终末黎明的渗透者。在这之后……和库尔达签订停战和约。”{n}在吐出“和约”这个词时，卡里戈斯脸上闪过一丝恶毒之意。那短短一刹那的神情，仿佛让他又回到了老样子。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Correct my mistakes. Save what is left of my protectorate: find the worlds lost to the warp storm; drive the xenos out; weed out the Final Dawn infiltrators. And... negotiate peace with House Chorda." {n}The spite with which Calligos spits out the word "peace" makes him look like his old self for just a brief moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: “弥补我犯下的错误，拯救我剩下的属地。我得找回被亚空间风暴隔绝的世界，把那里的异形赶走，消灭终末黎明的渗透者。在这之后……和库尔达签订停战和约。”{n}在吐出“和约”这个词时，卡里戈斯脸上闪过一丝恶毒之意。那短短一刹那的神情，仿佛让他又回到了老样子。{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: « Corriger mes erreurs. Sauver ce qu'il reste de mon protectorat. Retrouver les mondes qui ont disparu dans la tempête Warp, repousser les xénos, éradiquer les agents infiltrés de l'Aube finale... et négocier la paix avec la maison Chorda. » {n}L'espace d'un instant, vous voyez l'ancien Calligos refaire surface lorsqu'il crache le mot « paix » avec dédain.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Correct my mistakes. Save what is left of my protectorate: find the worlds lost to the warp storm; drive the xenos out; weed out the Final Dawn infiltrators. And... negotiate peace with House Chorda." {n}The spite with which Calligos spits out the word "peace" makes him look like his old self for just a brief moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: « Corriger mes erreurs. Sauver ce qu'il reste de mon protectorat. Retrouver les mondes qui ont disparu dans la tempête Warp, repousser les xénos, éradiquer les agents infiltrés de l'Aube finale... et négocier la paix avec la maison Chorda. » {n}L'espace d'un instant, vous voyez l'ancien Calligos refaire surface lorsqu'il crache le mot « paix » avec dédain.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: 「間違いを正す。俺の保護領に残されたものを救え。〈歪み〉の嵐で失われた世界を見つけ、ゼノを追い出し、最後の夜明けの侵入者を一掃する。そして…チョーダ家との和平交渉を行う」{n}カリゴスが『和平』という言葉を吐き出すほんの一瞬、以前の彼が垣間見えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: "Correct my mistakes. Save what is left of my protectorate: find the worlds lost to the warp storm; drive the xenos out; weed out the Final Dawn infiltrators. And... negotiate peace with House Chorda." {n}The spite with which Calligos spits out the word "peace" makes him look like his old self for just a brief moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: 「間違いを正す。俺の保護領に残されたものを救え。〈歪み〉の嵐で失われた世界を見つけ、ゼノを追い出し、最後の夜明けの侵入者を一掃する。そして…チョーダ家との和平交渉を行う」{n}カリゴスが『和平』という言葉を吐き出すほんの一瞬、以前の彼が垣間見えた。{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Fehler korrigieren. Retten, was von meinem Protektorat noch übrig ist. Die Welten finden, die im Warpsturm verloren gegangen sind; Xenos vertreiben; die Infiltratoren der Letzten Dämmerung ausrotten. Und ... einen Frieden mit Haus Chorda aushandeln." {n}Der Spott, mit dem Calligos das Wort "Frieden" ausspuckt lässt ihn für einen kurzen Augenblick wie sein altes Ich wirken.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Correct my mistakes. Save what is left of my protectorate: find the worlds lost to the warp storm; drive the xenos out; weed out the Final Dawn infiltrators. And... negotiate peace with House Chorda." {n}The spite with which Calligos spits out the word "peace" makes him look like his old self for just a brief moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Fehler korrigieren. Retten, was von meinem Protektorat noch übrig ist. Die Welten finden, die im Warpsturm verloren gegangen sind; Xenos vertreiben; die Infiltratoren der Letzten Dämmerung ausrotten. Und ... einen Frieden mit Haus Chorda aushandeln." {n}Der Spott, mit dem Calligos das Wort "Frieden" ausspuckt lässt ihn für einen kurzen Augenblick wie sein altes Ich wirken.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion

languages.text: "Hatalarımı telafi et. Protektoramdan geriye kalanları kurtar: Öteboyut fırtınasında kaybolan dünyaları bul, zenoları bu diyardan sür, Nihai Şafak casuslarını yok et. Bir de... Chorda Hanesi'yle barışı sağla." {n}Calligos'un "barış" kelimesini söylerken takındığı kinli tavır, onu bir anlığına eski Calligos'a dönüştürüyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: "Correct my mistakes. Save what is left of my protectorate: find the worlds lost to the warp storm; drive the xenos out; weed out the Final Dawn infiltrators. And... negotiate peace with House Chorda." {n}The spite with which Calligos spits out the word "peace" makes him look like his old self for just a brief moment.{/n}

traits.locale_text: "Hatam varsa düzelt. Protektoramdan geriye kalanları kurtar: Öteboyut fırtınasında kaybolan dünyaları bul, zenoları temizle, Nihai Şafak casuslarını yok et. Bir de... Chorda Hanesi'yle barışı sağla." {n}Calligos'un "barış" kelimesini söylerken takındığı kinli tavır, onu bir anlığına eski hâline dönüştürüyor.{/n}
traits.speaker: Winterscale_Companion
